mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.gds_no) FROM products p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gds_no, aprv_stts_cd FROM product_approval_history WHERE (gds_no, aprv_rjct_cycl) IN ( SELECT gds_no, MAX(aprv_rjct_cycl) FROM product_approval_history GROUP BY gds_no ) ) pah ON p.gds_no = pah.gds_no

SELECT p.gds_no, p.store_id, p.ctgry_no, p.gds_nm, p.bas_prc, p.dscnt_rt, (p.bas_prc * (100 - IFNULL(p.dscnt_rt, 0.00)) / 100) AS last_sel_prc, p.reg_dt, p.expsr_yn, p.actvtn_yn, pc.ctgry_nm, ( SELECT pi.img_file_path_nm FROM ks55team02db.product_images pi WHERE pi.gds_no = p.gds_no AND pi.img_type = 1 AND pi.actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY pi.img_indct_sn ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS thumbnail_image_path,
-- ⭐ 최신 승인 상태 조회 로직 수정 ⭐ COALESCE( ( SELECT pah_processed.aprv_stts_cd FROM ks55team02db.product_approval_history pah_processed WHERE pah_processed.gds_no = p.gds_no AND pah_processed.aprv_stts_cd != '대기' ORDER BY pah_processed.prcs_dt DESC, pah_processed.aprv_rjct_cycl DESC LIMIT 1 ), ( SELECT pah_latest.aprv_stts_cd FROM ks55team02db.product_approval_history pah_latest WHERE pah_latest.gds_no = p.gds_no ORDER BY pah_latest.prcs_dt DESC, pah_latest.aprv_rjct_cycl DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) AS latestApprovalStatus
FROM ks55team02db.products p LEFT JOIN ks55team02db.product_categories pc ON p.ctgry_no = pc.ctgry_no
ORDER BY
p.reg_dt p.gds_nm p.reg_dt
DESC ASC
ORDER BY p.reg_dt DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ps.gds_stts_no, GROUP_CONCAT(som.opt_vl_no ORDER BY som.opt_vl_no) AS opt_vl_nos, ps.sel_psblty_qntty FROM product_status ps LEFT JOIN status_option_mappings som ON ps.gds_stts_no = som.gds_stts_no WHERE ps.gds_no = #{gdsNo} AND ps.actvtn_yn = TRUE AND ps.sel_psblty_qntty > 0 GROUP BY ps.gds_stts_no, ps.sel_psblty_qntty ORDER BY ps.gds_stts_no

SELECT img_no, gds_no, img_file_path_nm, img_indct_sn, img_type, actvtn_yn FROM product_images WHERE gds_no = #{param1} AND img_type = #{param2, typeHandler=ks55team02.seller.products.handler.ProductImageTypeHandler}
